channel.title: Gah! Almost got him but now my bow is not working!
channel.description: Like some of you might have understood about the title, theres something wrong with a bow or bows, in my server. Yes some of you were right, karil x-bow(4734) is not working, it atts with melee and i wanna get it fire only bolt racks(4740) Could some nice guy (or girl) help me out here? :)
